name: prodeq2i
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2))
bodyPretty: ⊢ prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c0, c2)

stmt.origin: mprg(s0, c0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
stmt.pretty: mprg(s0, c0, prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c0, c2), c1 = c2)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: Equality inference for product. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 4-Dec-2017.)
